7d5af071-6dcc-42e6-99c5-4c8bf14b7f66.name: Ion Cannon Turret
7d5af071-6dcc-42e6-99c5-4c8bf14b7f66.text:
Attack: Attack 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc).

If this attack hits the target ship, the ship suffers 1 damage and receives 1 ion token. Then cancel all dice results.

13d862a4-43c5-4b72-8f5f-e42e211cffc8.name: Proton Torpedoes
13d862a4-43c5-4b72-8f5f-e42e211cffc8.text:
Attack (target lock): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack.

You may change 1 of your results to a result.

05e2935c-cc33-4e53-b9bb-5d1f522fd236.name: R2 Astromech
05e2935c-cc33-4e53-b9bb-5d1f522fd236.text: You may treat all 1- and 2-speed maneuvers as green maneuvers.

b7e6fc0f-633e-4c43-9c93-671112ce36e7.name: R2-D2
b7e6fc0f-633e-4c43-9c93-671112ce36e7.text: After executing a green maneuver, you may recover 1 shield (up to your shield value).

84ffa5e6-1cd6-4ab4-9b35-2e993e0150bd.name: R2-F2
84ffa5e6-1cd6-4ab4-9b35-2e993e0150bd.text: Action: Increase your agility value by 1 until the end of this game round.

7cc0c8a0-599b-4304-a643-d4d0223c50a6.name: R5-D8
7cc0c8a0-599b-4304-a643-d4d0223c50a6.text:
Action: Roll 1 defense die.

On a or result, discard 1 of your facedown Damage cards.

43548817-bc95-4ad9-b824-578f3aed42c4.name: R5-K6
43548817-bc95-4ad9-b824-578f3aed42c4.text:
After spending your target lock, roll 1 defense die.

On a result, immediately acquire a target lock on that same ship. You cannot spend this target lock during this attack.

51d2118a-ba45-42e1-b39c-8d973f7a565d.name: R5 Astromech
51d2118a-ba45-42e1-b39c-8d973f7a565d.text: During the End phase, you may choose 1 of your faceup Damage cards with the Ship trait and flip it facedown.

e8bdc287-3ab0-4944-8cca-ec198c04f72c.name: Determination
e8bdc287-3ab0-4944-8cca-ec198c04f72c.text: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card with the Pilot trait, discard it immediately without resolving its effect.

cb79b3a4-423a-4f26-b749-4dabab4ce481.name: Swarm Tactics
cb79b3a4-423a-4f26-b749-4dabab4ce481.text:
At the start of the Combat phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at Range 1.

Until the end of this phase, treat the chosen ship as if its pilot skill were equal to your pilot skill.

a234814a-2175-448f-95b3-62efebb16bef.name: Squad Leader
a234814a-2175-448f-95b3-62efebb16bef.text:
Action: Choose 1 ship at Range 1-2 that has a lower pilot skill than you.

The chosen ship may immediately perform 1 free action.

d1418bad-bffb-4e5c-b0b8-813bb804aba0.name: Expert Handling
d1418bad-bffb-4e5c-b0b8-813bb804aba0.text:
Action: Perform a free barrel roll action. If you do not have the action icon, receive 1 stress token.

You may then remove 1 enemy target lock from your ship.

0a37e9d4-9a0e-419f-8234-c53435244e03.name: Marksmanship
0a37e9d4-9a0e-419f-8234-c53435244e03.text: Action: When attacking this round, you may change 1 of your results to a result and all of your other results to results.

9fbdc4d8-106e-437f-856f-c8c410a4a3e9.name: Concussion Missiles
9fbdc4d8-106e-437f-856f-c8c410a4a3e9.text:
Attack (target lock): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack.

You may change 1 of your blank results to a result.

180115cf-6456-46b4-908f-1c6fe4932f47.name: Cluster Missiles
180115cf-6456-46b4-908f-1c6fe4932f47.text: Attack (target lock): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack twice.

a0840b7f-1fb2-45d2-b552-b1f3905d4373.name: Daredevil
a0840b7f-1fb2-45d2-b552-b1f3905d4373.text:
Action: Execute a white ( 1) or ( 1) maneuver. Then, receive 1 stress token.

Then, if you do not have the action icon, roll 2 attack dice. Suffer any damage () and any critical damage () rolled.

f395e428-31fc-4278-9d5f-4cdcfa59022b.name: Elusiveness
f395e428-31fc-4278-9d5f-4cdcfa59022b.text:
When defending, you may receive 1 stress token to choose 1 attack die. The attacker must reroll that die.

If you have at least 1 stress token, you cannot use this ability.

b866929b-62a2-4731-8c98-ec9be562e74f.name: Homing Missiles
b866929b-62a2-4731-8c98-ec9be562e74f.text:
Attack (target lock): Discard this card to perform this attack.

The defender cannot spend evade tokens during this attack.

6c833153-60e3-4277-9158-385ab4c6d15d.name: Push the Limit
6c833153-60e3-4277-9158-385ab4c6d15d.text:
Once per round, after you perform an action, you may perform 1 free action shown in your action bar.

Then receive 1 stress token.

670b371d-0781-471a-b575-2f81c59dcda5.name: Deadeye
670b371d-0781-471a-b575-2f81c59dcda5.text:
You may treat the Attack (target lock): header as Attack (focus):.

When an attack instructs you to spend a target lock, you may spend a focus token instead.

fbd82bb5-79b6-472e-b0ba-54e24d82df2b.name: Expose
fbd82bb5-79b6-472e-b0ba-54e24d82df2b.text: Action: Until the end of the round, increase your primary weapon value by 1 and decrease your agility value by 1.

e7c7e0e7-1603-463b-9a3f-03f1c49e2190.name: Gunner
e7c7e0e7-1603-463b-9a3f-03f1c49e2190.text: After you perform an attack that does not hit, you may immediately perform a primary weapon attack. You cannot perform another attack this round.

29722b25-eda6-4ff5-8024-092045076b2e.name: Ion Cannon
29722b25-eda6-4ff5-8024-092045076b2e.text:
Attack: Attack 1 ship.

If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 damage and receives 1 ion token. Then cancel all dice results.

44c52447-4cda-4f0c-a8f0-37ff24042b72.name: Heavy Laser Cannon
44c52447-4cda-4f0c-a8f0-37ff24042b72.text:
Attack: Attack 1 ship.

Immediately after rolling your attack dice, you must change all of your results to results.

098cc8d8-7b8c-4298-849a-4c58f16469b1.name: Seismic Charges
098cc8d8-7b8c-4298-849a-4c58f16469b1.text:
When you reveal your maneuver dial, you may discard this card to drop 1 seismic charge token.

This token detonates at the end of the Activation phase.

Seismic Charge Token: When this bomb token detonates, each ship at Range 1 of the token suffers 1 damage. Then discard this token.

4cae6ddb-7086-4437-b8d2-a2a7f46a2c21.name: Mercenary Copilot
4cae6ddb-7086-4437-b8d2-a2a7f46a2c21.text: When attacking at Range 3, you may change 1 of your results to a result.

4987af28-904d-4779-b817-c006e4f263b1.name: Assault Missiles
4987af28-904d-4779-b817-c006e4f263b1.text:
Attack (target lock): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack.

If this attack hits, each other ship at Range 1 of the defender suffers 1 damage.

d6b45b8f-2cd8-4fbd-8c48-fa05e0cd20fe.name: Proximity Mines
d6b45b8f-2cd8-4fbd-8c48-fa05e0cd20fe.text:
Action: Discard this card to drop 1 proximity mine token.

When a ship's base or maneuver template overlaps this token, this token detonates.

Proximity Mine Token: When this bomb token detonates, the ship that moved through or overlapped this token rolls 3 attack dice and suffers all damage () and critical damage () rolled. Then discard this token.

812464c2-06d9-4cdf-ac0a-55861a649758.name: Weapons Engineer
812464c2-06d9-4cdf-ac0a-55861a649758.text:
You may maintain 2 target locks (only 1 per enemy ship).

When you acquire a target lock, you may lock onto 2 different ships.

bdd25f81-5b0c-4e3e-af2c-6c1e7cf801a5.name: Draw Their Fire
bdd25f81-5b0c-4e3e-af2c-6c1e7cf801a5.text: When a friendly ship at Range 1 is hit by an attack, you may suffer 1 of the uncanceled results instead of the target ship.

bb17f06a-b392-423d-9907-e6e246602d7d.name: Luke Skywalker
bb17f06a-b392-423d-9907-e6e246602d7d.text:
Rebel only.

After you perform an attack that does not hit, you may immediately perform a primary weapon attack. You may change 1 result to a result. You cannot perform another attack this round.

e1fbd5df-aa57-4188-906a-4d5d3bfcfdc1.name: Nien Nunb
e1fbd5df-aa57-4188-906a-4d5d3bfcfdc1.text:
Rebel only.

You may treat all maneuvers as green maneuvers.

133e677d-ac48-4bc1-b0a1-0468352130a9.name: Chewbacca
133e677d-ac48-4bc1-b0a1-0468352130a9.text:
Rebel only.

When you are dealt a Damage card, you may immediately discard that card and recover 1 shield.

Then, discard this Upgrade card.

05db70c6-8d53-47dc-a9da-14140157fe25.name: Advanced Proton Torpedoes
05db70c6-8d53-47dc-a9da-14140157fe25.text:
Attack (target lock): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack.

You may change up to 3 of your blank results to results.

7fb5be97-0989-40b0-9b95-de4f3d228c13.name: Autoblaster
7fb5be97-0989-40b0-9b95-de4f3d228c13.text:
Attack: Attack 1 ship.

Your results cannot be canceled by defense dice.

The defender may cancel results before results.

735814cf-a10c-41e4-a8a0-8e68cb7e2af1.name: Fire-Control System
735814cf-a10c-41e4-a8a0-8e68cb7e2af1.text: After you perform an attack, you may acquire a target lock on the defender.

dee7669b-70ed-4739-bc99-ef6306d8b81b.name: Blaster Turret
dee7669b-70ed-4739-bc99-ef6306d8b81b.text: Attack (focus): Spend 1 focus token to perform this attack against 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc).

8c9a3a8c-7b1f-4078-91f7-91ce7a9644b6.name: Recon Specialist
8c9a3a8c-7b1f-4078-91f7-91ce7a9644b6.text: When you perform a focus action, assign 1 additional focus token to your ship.

d5b71714-2a8c-4abc-92b8-4516aa023cfe.name: Saboteur
d5b71714-2a8c-4abc-92b8-4516aa023cfe.text: Action: Choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1 and roll 1 attack die. On a or result, choose 1 random facedown Damage card assigned to that ship, flip it faceup, and resolve it.

4e0ee680-12a6-44ae-a9f0-f8d3cba93a9f.name: Intelligence Agent
4e0ee680-12a6-44ae-a9f0-f8d3cba93a9f.text: At the start of the Activation phase, choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1-2. You may look at that ship's chosen maneuver.

38fc314b-7503-427a-9c16-0a206d319205.name: Proton Bombs
38fc314b-7503-427a-9c16-0a206d319205.text:
When you reveal your maneuver dial, you may discard this card to drop 1 proton bomb token.

This token detonates at the end of the Activation phase.

Proton Bomb Token: When this bomb token detonates, deal 1 faceup Damage card to each ship at Range 1 of the token. Then discard this token.

18cc1b1d-f8b9-40c2-8b5a-a8142a245f3c.name: Adrenaline Rush
18cc1b1d-f8b9-40c2-8b5a-a8142a245f3c.text: When you reveal a red maneuver, you may discard this card to treat that maneuver as a white maneuver until the end of the Activation phase.

4e6e1dc5-89d3-49de-b4d5-1f1323cef14e.name: Advanced Sensors
4e6e1dc5-89d3-49de-b4d5-1f1323cef14e.text:
Immediately before you reveal your maneuver, you may perform 1 free action.

If you use this ability, you must skip your "Perform Action" step during this round.

c230418b-88a2-4568-bed2-547d7363c760.name: Sensor Jammer
c230418b-88a2-4568-bed2-547d7363c760.text:
When defending, you may change 1 of the attacker's results into a result.

The attacker cannot reroll the die with the changed result.

d64c003a-e195-4f22-ae86-72962652915d.name: Darth Vader
d64c003a-e195-4f22-ae86-72962652915d.text:
Imperial only.

After you perform an attack against an enemy ship, you may suffer 2 damage to cause that ship to suffer 1 critical damage.

d6d26709-78f6-422c-8c44-f172cdfbf32c.name: Rebel Captive
d6d26709-78f6-422c-8c44-f172cdfbf32c.text:
Imperial only.

Once per round, the first ship that declares you as the target of an attack immediately receives 1 stress token.

0f28086d-6b04-46e8-8f03-a94d201b03bb.name: Flight Instructor
0f28086d-6b04-46e8-8f03-a94d201b03bb.text: When defending, you may reroll 1 of your results. If the attacker's pilot skill value is "2" or lower, you may reroll 1 of your blank results instead.

14121fb8-d41d-4d46-b9e8-c338a808eb6a.name: Navigator
14121fb8-d41d-4d46-b9e8-c338a808eb6a.text:
When you reveal a maneuver, you may rotate your dial to another maneuver with the same bearing.

You cannot rotate to a red maneuver if you have any stress tokens.

04fd0071-dc2a-4120-9e50-d188c588ada4.name: Opportunist
04fd0071-dc2a-4120-9e50-d188c588ada4.text:
When attacking, if the defender does not have any focus or evade tokens, you may receive 1 stress token to roll 1 additional attack die.

You cannot use this ability if you have any stress tokens.

9c91191c-1667-4e17-8214-cbbbfff25293.name: Comms Booster
9c91191c-1667-4e17-8214-cbbbfff25293.text: Energy: Spend 1 energy to remove all stress tokens from a friendly ship at Range 1-3. Then assign 1 focus token to that ship.

23d95070-3b79-4f1d-a069-e0b3f9ae9795.name: Slicer Tools
23d95070-3b79-4f1d-a069-e0b3f9ae9795.text: Action: Choose 1 or more ships at Range 1-3 that have a stress token. For each ship chosen, you may spend 1 energy to cause that ship to suffer 1 damage.

620b4ba3-a142-4b3d-8bc5-c4f680985ceb.name: Shield Projector
620b4ba3-a142-4b3d-8bc5-c4f680985ceb.text: When an enemy ship is declaring either a small or large ship as the target of its attack, you may spend 3 energy to force that ship to target you if possible.

bbfd83b3-89f6-4611-9bf3-63bd4cb38eed.name: Ion Pulse Missiles
bbfd83b3-89f6-4611-9bf3-63bd4cb38eed.text:
Attack (target lock): Discard this card to perform this attack.

If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 damage and receives 2 ion tokens. Then cancel all dice results.

69aa1467-438d-4faf-8841-cb48f20cfc19.name: Wingman
69aa1467-438d-4faf-8841-cb48f20cfc19.text: At the start of the Combat phase, remove 1 stress token from another friendly ship at Range 1.

12b45a1c-6aa9-4440-82b0-224ecfe82144.name: Decoy
12b45a1c-6aa9-4440-82b0-224ecfe82144.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at Range 1-2. Exchange your pilot skill with that ship's pilot skill until the end of the phase.

36002ae3-bb08-438b-9424-f9aac18b6f02.name: Outmaneuver
36002ae3-bb08-438b-9424-f9aac18b6f02.text: When attacking a ship inside your firing arc, if you are not inside that ship's firing arc, reduce its agility value by 1 (to a minimum of 0).

5877a08e-b58d-415f-a8f3-a0c4c3a6832e.name: Predator
5877a08e-b58d-415f-a8f3-a0c4c3a6832e.text: When attacking, you may reroll 1 attack die. If the defender's pilot skill value is "2" or lower, you may instead reroll up to 2 attack dice.

49bad61f-aa81-4c8b-8aa8-c50a85e4790d.name: Flechette Torpedoes
49bad61f-aa81-4c8b-8aa8-c50a85e4790d.text:
Attack (target lock): Discard this card and spend your target lock to perform this attack.

After you perform this attack, the defender receives 1 stress token if its hull value is "4" or lower.

06e68a40-52e8-48ca-b72c-e97b2f3e2bc5.name: R7 Astromech
06e68a40-52e8-48ca-b72c-e97b2f3e2bc5.text: Once per round when defending, if you have a target lock on the attacker, you may spend the target lock to choose any or all attack dice. The attacker must reroll the chosen dice.

15ab8f28-a31d-4a67-82f5-e5354da395b5.name: R7-T1
15ab8f28-a31d-4a67-82f5-e5354da395b5.text: Action: Choose an enemy ship at Range 1-2. If you are inside that ship's firing arc, you may acquire a target lock on that ship. Then, you may perform a free boost action.

b201800d-7537-410b-a79a-919b70dbd07f.name: Tactician
b201800d-7537-410b-a79a-919b70dbd07f.text: After you perform an attack against a ship inside your firing arc at Range 2, that ship receives 1 stress token.

1000ffdc-6da8-4c84-8161-252318097fb2.name: R2-D2 (Crew)
1000ffdc-6da8-4c84-8161-252318097fb2.text:
Rebel only.

At the end of the End phase, if you have no shields, you may recover 1 shield and roll 1 attack die. On a result, randomly flip 1 of your facedown Damage cards faceup and resolve it.

ce189302-f620-4dce-af9a-d7a5f230ca12.name: C-3PO
ce189302-f620-4dce-af9a-d7a5f230ca12.text:
Rebel only.

Once per round, before you roll 1 or more defense dice, you may guess aloud a number of results. If you roll that many results (before modifying dice), add 1 result.

ee4b6818-b86c-4c00-b37a-f4a69628fe79.name: Single Turbolasers
ee4b6818-b86c-4c00-b37a-f4a69628fe79.text: Attack (Energy): Spend 2 energy from this card to perform this attack. The defender doubles his agility value against this attack. You may change 1 of your results to a result.

e2187dc2-7d93-4d8d-bdfb-553553348e75.name: Quad Laser Cannons
e2187dc2-7d93-4d8d-bdfb-553553348e75.text: Attack (Energy): Spend 1 energy from this card to perform this attack. If this attack does not hit, you may immediately spend 1 energy from this card to perform this attack again.

82793c3e-5011-4d2a-9c29-68b2c7d8de43.name: Tibanna Gas Supplies
82793c3e-5011-4d2a-9c29-68b2c7d8de43.text: Energy: You may discard this card to gain 3 energy.

a60565c0-3be0-4aec-a281-c53b556e1531.name: Ionization Reactor
a60565c0-3be0-4aec-a281-c53b556e1531.text: Energy: Spend 5 energy from this card and discard this card to cause each other ship at Range 1 to suffer 1 damage and receive 1 ion token.

86bc77c6-a1e6-427e-a297-319aaf9a87f2.name: Engine Booster
86bc77c6-a1e6-427e-a297-319aaf9a87f2.text: Immediately before you reveal your maneuver dial, you may spend 1 energy to execute a white ( 1) maneuver. You cannot use this ability if you would overlap another ship.

cd0ae6ed-7731-4264-9396-b6c45b108591.name: R3-A2
cd0ae6ed-7731-4264-9396-b6c45b108591.text: When you declare the target of your attack, if the defender is inside your firing arc, you may receive 1 stress token to cause the defender to receive 1 stress token.

06fe6e17-7bb9-4d33-aab0-f37f28150c7a.name: R2-D6
06fe6e17-7bb9-4d33-aab0-f37f28150c7a.text:
Your upgrade bar gains the upgrade icon.

You cannot equip this upgrade if you already have a upgrade icon or if your pilot skill value is "2" or lower.

7cb9b27a-0c26-49dd-8d67-453691264335.name: Enhanced Scopes
7cb9b27a-0c26-49dd-8d67-453691264335.text: During the Activation phase, treat your pilot skill value as "0".

63fd9f45-0dde-4eb4-846b-867ee8344f02.name: Chardaan Refit
63fd9f45-0dde-4eb4-846b-867ee8344f02.text:
A-Wing only.

This card has a negative squad point cost.

919046ea-a397-4188-ade5-535ce4593c5b.name: Proton Rockets
919046ea-a397-4188-ade5-535ce4593c5b.text:
Attack (Focus): Discard this card to perform this attack.

You may roll additional attack dice equal to your agility value, to a maximum of 3 additional dice.

cff8a4e3-91a9-4ca2-8609-78430dc082a0.name: Kyle Katarn
cff8a4e3-91a9-4ca2-8609-78430dc082a0.text:
Rebel only.

After you remove a stress token from your ship, you may assign a focus token to your ship.

a503104f-a2cd-40f1-ab8c-8bd19f72d2ac.name: Jan Ors
a503104f-a2cd-40f1-ab8c-8bd19f72d2ac.text:
Rebel only.

Once per round, when a friendly ship at Range 1-3 performs a focus action or would be assigned a focus token, you may assign it an evade token instead.

43f92491-97bc-489e-aa7e-17d6b03a1388.name: Toryn Farr
43f92491-97bc-489e-aa7e-17d6b03a1388.text:
Huge Ship only. Rebel only.

Action: Spend any amount of energy to choose that many enemy ships at Range 1-2. Remove all focus, evade, and blue target lock tokens from those ships.

8160daa0-8464-48cf-9a75-9e9d442c9824.name: R4-D6
8160daa0-8464-48cf-9a75-9e9d442c9824.text: When you are hit by an attack and there are at least 3 uncanceled results, you may choose to cancel those results until there are 2 remaining. For each result canceled this way, receive 1 stress token.

34384b0b-00a2-44c9-94f7-8f4ed7b8a581.name: R5-P9
34384b0b-00a2-44c9-94f7-8f4ed7b8a581.text: At the end of the Combat phase, you may spend 1 of your focus tokens to recover 1 shield (up to your shield value).

032467fa-5c73-45da-8ec3-1aa68deea1be.name: WED-15 Repair Droid
032467fa-5c73-45da-8ec3-1aa68deea1be.text:
Huge Ship only.

Action: Spend 1 energy to discard 1 of your facedown Damage cards, or spend 3 energy to discard 1 of your faceup Damage cards.

771ad90f-04ac-4205-837b-a44476ae8b2e.name: Carlist Rieekan
771ad90f-04ac-4205-837b-a44476ae8b2e.text:
Huge Ship only. Rebel only.

At the start of the Activation phase, you may discard this card to treat each friendly ship's pilot skill value as "12" until the end of the phase.

37cd6693-2643-46d8-94c8-2c069cf31037.name: Jan Dodonna
37cd6693-2643-46d8-94c8-2c069cf31037.text:
Huge Ship only. Rebel only.

When another friendly ship at Range 1 is attacking, it may change 1 of its results to a .

86866a6e-e089-43e3-b913-45a3705e52a8.name: Expanded Cargo Hold
86866a6e-e089-43e3-b913-45a3705e52a8.text:
GR-75 only.

Once per round, when you would be dealt a faceup Damage card, you may draw that card from either the fore or aft Damage deck.

63d2f24c-0c88-4e25-91bb-8b2a549f3fbe.name: Backup Shield Generator
63d2f24c-0c88-4e25-91bb-8b2a549f3fbe.text: At the end of each round, you may spend 1 energy to recover 1 shield (up to your shield value).

c90b6570-01da-43d5-8b06-5c81e3a9ca76.name: EM Emitter
c90b6570-01da-43d5-8b06-5c81e3a9ca76.text: When you obstruct an attack, the defender rolls 3 additional defense dice (instead of 1).

7e7f63a4-38d3-4ff2-a34b-9ed7841b7ca6.name: Frequency Jammer
7e7f63a4-38d3-4ff2-a34b-9ed7841b7ca6.text: When you perform a jam action, choose 1 enemy ship that does not have a stress token and is at Range 1 of the jammed ship. The chosen ship receives 1 stress token.

903d58ca-0807-4334-b44c-aae854c21940.name: Han Solo
903d58ca-0807-4334-b44c-aae854c21940.text:
Rebel only.

When attacking, if you have a target lock on the defender, you may spend that target lock to change all of your results to results.

f1215c7c-fcf5-405a-a683-6383d5024285.name: Leia Organa
f1215c7c-fcf5-405a-a683-6383d5024285.text:
Rebel only.

At the start of the Activation phase, you may discard this card to allow all friendly ships that reveal a red maneuver to treat that maneuver as a white maneuver until the end of the phase.

b432ec62-b8a8-4bbe-9baa-a02acb18080c.name: Targeting Coordinator
b432ec62-b8a8-4bbe-9baa-a02acb18080c.text: Energy: You may spend 1 energy to choose 1 friendly ship at Range 1-2. Acquire a target lock, then assign the blue target lock token to the chosen ship.

3d1302ea-986a-4191-a837-26104e41956e.name: Raymus Antilles
3d1302ea-986a-4191-a837-26104e41956e.text:
Huge Ship only. Rebel only.

At the start of the Activation phase, choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1-3. You may look at that ship's chosen maneuver. If the maneuver is white, assign that ship 1 stress token.

9149e209-fe0a-4131-88a4-b1049fdf4601.name: Gunnery Team
9149e209-fe0a-4131-88a4-b1049fdf4601.text: Once per round, when attacking with a secondary weapon, you may spend 1 energy to change 1 of your blank results to a result.

4031d5a9-b120-4ffc-a448-d3c328db67b1.name: Sensor Team
4031d5a9-b120-4ffc-a448-d3c328db67b1.text: When acquiring a target lock, you may lock onto an enemy ship at Range 1-5 instead of 1-3.

baf4f504-23c2-4e9c-af05-c9c7d9af6836.name: Engineering Team
baf4f504-23c2-4e9c-af05-c9c7d9af6836.text: During the Activation phase, when you reveal a maneuver, gain 1 additional energy during the "Gain Energy" step.

ebeea625-cdad-44e0-b0fa-964608766878.name: Lando Calrissian
ebeea625-cdad-44e0-b0fa-964608766878.text:
Rebel only.

Action: Roll 2 defense dice. For each result, assign 1 focus token to your ship. For each result, assign 1 evade token to your ship.

54c3dbd7-4135-49af-aa06-798872a93a2f.name: Mara Jade
54c3dbd7-4135-49af-aa06-798872a93a2f.text:
Imperial only.

At the end of the Combat phase, each enemy ship at Range 1 that does not have a stress token receives 1 stress token.

853b01af-2727-4a3a-9d40-585a0d390068.name: Fleet Officer
853b01af-2727-4a3a-9d40-585a0d390068.text:
Imperial only.

Action: Choose up to 2 friendly ships within Range 1-2 and assign 1 focus token to each of those ships. Then receive 1 stress token.

65c0aa54-0136-4934-ae4a-2fd5cf62e3ff.name: Stay On Target
65c0aa54-0136-4934-ae4a-2fd5cf62e3ff.text:
When you reveal a maneuver, you may rotate your dial to another maneuver with the same speed.

Treat that maneuver as a red maneuver.

9f2aedd7-05e6-4088-a710-2beb72fee29f.name: Dash Rendar
9f2aedd7-05e6-4088-a710-2beb72fee29f.text:
Rebel only.

You may perform attacks while overlapping an obstacle.

Your attacks cannot be obstructed.

3f1d4a05-379f-40e4-88ba-7f8cdbc51b1d.name: Lone Wolf
3f1d4a05-379f-40e4-88ba-7f8cdbc51b1d.text: When attacking or defending, if there are no other friendly ships at Range 1-2, you may reroll 1 of your blank results.

ed788c51-01b9-4fcc-baec-62d097effc9d.name: "Leebo"
ed788c51-01b9-4fcc-baec-62d097effc9d.text:
Rebel only.

Action: Perform a free boost action. Then receive 1 ion token.

1d79475f-40a2-41b4-b7c9-0f5414fe110a.name: Ruthlessness
1d79475f-40a2-41b4-b7c9-0f5414fe110a.text:
Imperial only.

After you perform an attack that hits, you must choose 1 other ship at Range 1 of the defender (other than yourself). That ship suffers 1 damage.

102ad4c6-4f7a-4337-ac30-570739c4a200.name: Intimidation
102ad4c6-4f7a-4337-ac30-570739c4a200.text: While you are touching an enemy ship, reduce that ship's agility value by 1.

858d2b63-5938-4b7c-b18e-f34b881efe95.name: Ysanne Isard
858d2b63-5938-4b7c-b18e-f34b881efe95.text:
Imperial only.

At the start of the Combat phase, if you have no shields and at least 1 Damage card assigned to your ship, you may perform a free evade action.

7a294860-75bf-4708-bb77-1a877787122c.name: Moff Jerjerrod
7a294860-75bf-4708-bb77-1a877787122c.text:
Imperial only.

When you are dealt a faceup Damage card, you may discard this Upgrade card or another Upgrade card to flip that Damage card facedown (without resolving its effect).

5b9dd2d5-b714-4b50-bdcb-bd3328da1bd2.name: Ion Torpedoes
5b9dd2d5-b714-4b50-bdcb-bd3328da1bd2.text:
Attack (target lock): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack.

If this attack hits, the defender and each ship at Range 1 of it receives 1 ion token.

a9bde6b3-c121-4191-9933-96da3104a370.name: Bodyguard
a9bde6b3-c121-4191-9933-96da3104a370.text:
Scum only.

At the start of the Combat phase, you may spend a focus token to choose a friendly ship at Range 1 with higher pilot skill than you. Increase its agility value by 1 until the end of the round.

6d54be24-6881-49e3-8115-ae43f9262c9b.name: Accuracy Corrector
6d54be24-6881-49e3-8115-ae43f9262c9b.text:
When attacking, you may cancel all dice results. Then, you may add 2 results.

Your dice cannot be modified again during this attack.

7953af24-6b7e-418b-8ed8-6206ad73c6b9.name: Inertial Dampeners
7953af24-6b7e-418b-8ed8-6206ad73c6b9.text: When you reveal your maneuver, you may discard this card to instead perform a white [0] maneuver. Then receive 1 stress token.

88f3b871-94cf-4d2f-9f5b-76b139f3bd0d.name: Flechette Cannon
88f3b871-94cf-4d2f-9f5b-76b139f3bd0d.text:
Attack: Attack 1 ship.

If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 damage and, if the defender is not stressed, it also receives 1 stress token. Then cancel all dice results.

7de3d3bf-cb71-48cf-8f76-174412f77280.name: "Mangler" Cannon
7de3d3bf-cb71-48cf-8f76-174412f77280.text:
Attack: Attack 1 ship.

When attacking, you may change 1 of your results to a result.

73c1d3bf-ab78-48ba-af0b-ab24edef73a4.name: Dead Man's Switch
73c1d3bf-ab78-48ba-af0b-ab24edef73a4.text: When you are destroyed, each ship at Range 1 suffers 1 damage.

548221dc-26a2-4b6a-9969-ee2eb6a50163.name: Feedback Array
548221dc-26a2-4b6a-9969-ee2eb6a50163.text: During the Combat phase, instead of performing any attacks, you may receive 1 ion token and suffer 1 damage to choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1. That ship suffers 1 damage.

238b9422-7242-44c3-84de-862acf2b828a.name: "Hot Shot" Blaster
238b9422-7242-44c3-84de-862acf2b828a.text: Attack: Discard this card to attack 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc).

30b27a3b-f28d-4fa5-a7dc-c517c6c6487e.name: Greedo
30b27a3b-f28d-4fa5-a7dc-c517c6c6487e.text:
Scum only.

The first time you attack each round and the first time you defend each round, the first Damage card dealt is dealt faceup.

e4bc9c1b-0632-4a53-b6ea-1f2621ba6152.name: Salvaged Astromech
e4bc9c1b-0632-4a53-b6ea-1f2621ba6152.text:
When you are dealt a Damage card with the Ship trait, you may immediately discard that card (before resolving its effect).

Then, discard this Upgrade card.

ae44f9e1-d2e1-4e6a-bc99-8667f3799322.name: Bomb Loadout
ae44f9e1-d2e1-4e6a-bc99-8667f3799322.text:
Y-Wing only.

Your upgrade bar gains the icon.

ba0233e2-e4ed-4b24-ac4e-b1c85055871e.name: "Genius"
ba0233e2-e4ed-4b24-ac4e-b1c85055871e.text: If you are equipped with a bomb that can be dropped before you reveal your maneuver, you may drop the bomb after you execute your maneuver instead.

df69b554-7e26-4443-b194-a9c2e1d1b5d9.name: Unhinged Astromech
df69b554-7e26-4443-b194-a9c2e1d1b5d9.text: You may treat all 3-speed maneuvers as green maneuvers.

6285843e-9727-47c3-b3bb-9f21ebc71300.name: R4-B11
6285843e-9727-47c3-b3bb-9f21ebc71300.text: When attacking, if you have a target lock on the defender, you may spend the target lock to choose any or all defense dice. The defender must reroll the chosen dice.

286e3a3f-e787-4b3e-be06-3a3448390cb5.name: Autoblaster Turret
286e3a3f-e787-4b3e-be06-3a3448390cb5.text:
Attack: Attack 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc).

Your results cannot be canceled by defense dice. The defender may cancel results before results.

ce6924a3-339c-42b6-9c65-114a01aa31c3.name: R4 Agromech
ce6924a3-339c-42b6-9c65-114a01aa31c3.text: When attacking, after you spend a focus token, you may acquire a target lock on the defender.

1ee4cc58-30a7-44ab-98fd-3adadb41d5b2.name: K4 Security Droid
1ee4cc58-30a7-44ab-98fd-3adadb41d5b2.text: After executing a green maneuver, you may acquire a target lock.

5313c83c-173d-4f5f-92af-8d24fb2a3530.name: Outlaw Tech
5313c83c-173d-4f5f-92af-8d24fb2a3530.text: After you execute a red maneuver, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.

a48656af-65cf-45d1-89f7-be57fcfb0d6f.name: Advanced Targeting Computer
a48656af-65cf-45d1-89f7-be57fcfb0d6f.text:
TIE Advanced only.

When attacking with your primary weapon, if you have a target lock on the defender, you may add 1 result to your roll. If you do, you cannot spend target locks during this attack.

bda516e1-36ae-48d0-b003-480060bff32f.name: Ion Cannon Battery
bda516e1-36ae-48d0-b003-480060bff32f.text: Attack (energy): Spend 2 energy from this card to perform this attack. If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 critical damage and receives 1 ion token. Then cancel all dice results.

574fe969-ec57-4ea6-9035-aa0f24c0540d.name: Stealth Device
574fe969-ec57-4ea6-9035-aa0f24c0540d.text: Increase your agility value by 1. If you are hit by an attack, discard this card.

0f9cc01f-b934-4c4a-aba3-0a56baca3e4e.name: Engine Upgrade
0f9cc01f-b934-4c4a-aba3-0a56baca3e4e.text: Your action bar gains the action icon.

c4fc4f71-a1aa-4fe9-92d0-1b41b9beea21.name: Anti-Pursuit Lasers
c4fc4f71-a1aa-4fe9-92d0-1b41b9beea21.text:
Large Ship only.

After an enemy ship executes a maneuver that causes it to overlap your ship, roll 1 attack die. On a or result, the enemy ship suffers 1 damage.

7e22bf85-99ef-43a4-a752-2e7658362f6c.name: Targeting Computer
7e22bf85-99ef-43a4-a752-2e7658362f6c.text: Your action bar gains the action icon.

d1a21374-cf74-4078-b21b-e89b00391eda.name: Munitions Failsafe
d1a21374-cf74-4078-b21b-e89b00391eda.text: When attacking with a secondary weapon that instructs you to discard it to perform the attack, do not discard it unless the attack hits.

36047cb9-10b8-45ee-a52c-8374ff45dcf8.name: Stygium Particle Accelerator
36047cb9-10b8-45ee-a52c-8374ff45dcf8.text: When you either decloak or perform a cloak action, you may perform a free evade action.

461ecfd4-58ad-41ec-8e82-757ff4d34377.name: Advanced Cloaking Device
461ecfd4-58ad-41ec-8e82-757ff4d34377.text:
TIE Phantom only.

After you perform an attack, you may perform a free cloak action.

d8c80404-e17d-4228-aa7b-28ad2242c50b.name: Combat Retrofit
d8c80404-e17d-4228-aa7b-28ad2242c50b.text:
GR-75 only.

Increase your hull value by 2 and your shield value by 1.

0194a553-9608-4c69-91dc-9d35e8eadad2.name: B-Wing/E2
0194a553-9608-4c69-91dc-9d35e8eadad2.text:
B-Wing only.

Your upgrade bar gains the upgrade icon.

6554e79e-3a24-4e5c-aeed-d1237d7e9236.name: Countermeasures
6554e79e-3a24-4e5c-aeed-d1237d7e9236.text:
Large Ship only.

At the start of the Combat phase, you may discard this card to increase your agility value by 1 until the end of the round. Then you may remove 1 enemy target lock from your ship.

6e937e4c-ce23-4bba-804b-11f35f95aeec.name: Experimental Interface
6e937e4c-ce23-4bba-804b-11f35f95aeec.text: Once per round, after you perform an action, you may perform 1 free action from an equipped Upgrade card with the "Action:" header. Then receive 1 stress token.

122e303c-ce49-4f69-88ce-2976a324b4da.name: Tactical Jammer
122e303c-ce49-4f69-88ce-2976a324b4da.text:
Large Ship only.

Your ship can obstruct enemy attacks.

46cd5a75-59ae-4f77-8196-38c1b08b0aae.name: Autothrusters
46cd5a75-59ae-4f77-8196-38c1b08b0aae.text: When defending, if you are beyond Range 2 or outside the attacker's firing arc, you may change 1 of your blank results to a result. You can equip this card only if you have the action icon.

51c82a0f-806a-415c-974a-f17d85257914.name: Slave I
51c82a0f-806a-415c-974a-f17d85257914.text:
Firespray-31 only.

Your upgrade bar gains the upgrade icon.

231ed78c-1e3d-4938-9953-9f4ad9a95674.name: Millennium Falcon
231ed78c-1e3d-4938-9953-9f4ad9a95674.text:
YT-1300 only.

Your action bar gains the action icon.

f14a0003-199a-4fba-a12b-f459fdf91c34.name: Moldy Crow
f14a0003-199a-4fba-a12b-f459fdf91c34.text:
HWK-290 only.

During the End phase, do not remove unused focus tokens from your ship.

af57db31-a1d0-43fa-914a-364f3f2cf4bb.name: ST-321
af57db31-a1d0-43fa-914a-364f3f2cf4bb.text:
Lambda-class Shuttle only.

When acquiring a target lock, you may lock onto any enemy ship in the play area.

6cf3d276-fef0-453e-8343-71f38ae68f55.name: Royal Guard TIE
6cf3d276-fef0-453e-8343-71f38ae68f55.text:
TIE Interceptor only.

You may equip up to 2 different Modification upgrades (instead of 1).

You cannot equip this card if your pilot skill value is "4" or lower.

52851ff6-b4b4-45a0-84e4-208abd570f6b.name: Dodonna's Pride
52851ff6-b4b4-45a0-84e4-208abd570f6b.text:
CR90 fore section only.

When you perform a coordinate action, you may choose 2 friendly ships (instead of 1). Those ships may each perform 1 free action.

18d677ab-4719-473e-81b3-2d1602f82f5b.name: A-Wing Test Pilot
18d677ab-4719-473e-81b3-2d1602f82f5b.text:
A-Wing only.

Your upgrade bar gains 1 upgrade icon.

You cannot equip 2 of the same Upgrade cards. You cannot equip this if your pilot skill value is "1" or lower.

aa9b66a1-ad3b-403e-bbd1-09d190085ea1.name: Tantive IV
aa9b66a1-ad3b-403e-bbd1-09d190085ea1.text:
CR90 fore section only.

Your fore section upgrade bar gains 1 additional and 1 additional upgrade icon.

2f3352dc-faf9-47d5-aaff-3d1c9f0a8888.name: Bright Hope
2f3352dc-faf9-47d5-aaff-3d1c9f0a8888.text:
GR-75 only.

A reinforce action assigned to your fore section adds 2 results (instead of 1).

9e6e6c8b-5665-4972-ba70-b6bbc2bdacc7.name: Quantum Storm
9e6e6c8b-5665-4972-ba70-b6bbc2bdacc7.text:
GR-75 only.

At the start of the End phase, if you have 1 or fewer energy tokens, gain 1 energy token.

cc66ad8c-b2bf-401d-ba81-fa3a8ea15d62.name: Dutyfree
cc66ad8c-b2bf-401d-ba81-fa3a8ea15d62.text:
GR-75 only.

When performing a jam action, you may choose an enemy ship at Range 1-3 (instead of at Range 1-2).

e49da252-2efc-4f09-8656-cac1b4b4274d.name: Jaina's Light
e49da252-2efc-4f09-8656-cac1b4b4274d.text:
CR90 fore section only.

When defending, once per attack, if you are dealt a faceup Damage card, you may discard it and draw another faceup Damage card.

35b6e937-e373-499b-a2d0-f9b5c15a381d.name: Outrider
35b6e937-e373-499b-a2d0-f9b5c15a381d.text:
YT-2400 only.

While you have a Upgrade card equipped, you cannot perform primary weapon attacks and you may perform secondary weapon attacks against ships outside your firing arc.

11f6c209-3f62-4c58-81d3-3845766cb7b4.name: Dauntless
11f6c209-3f62-4c58-81d3-3845766cb7b4.text:
VT-49 Decimator only.

After you execute a maneuver that causes you to overlap another ship, you may perform 1 free action. Then receive 1 stress token.

67611512-51c1-4d6d-8564-708692c4fbd2.name: Virago
67611512-51c1-4d6d-8564-708692c4fbd2.text:
StarViper only.

Your upgrade bar gains the and upgrade icons.

You cannot equip this card if your pilot skill value is "3" or lower.

89d35da1-4b56-415a-8c56-be740e98615f.name: "Heavy Scyk" Interceptor (Cannon)
89d35da1-4b56-415a-8c56-be740e98615f.text:
M3-A Interceptor only.

Your upgrade bar gains the , , or upgrade icon.

789a8305-7212-4ec2-8ab9-32ec09e6601d.name: "Heavy Scyk" Interceptor (Torpedo)
789a8305-7212-4ec2-8ab9-32ec09e6601d.text:
M3-A Interceptor only.

Your upgrade bar gains the , , or upgrade icon.

bf2d576d-90cc-4cda-a4c0-ce93dc261f37.name: "Heavy Scyk" Interceptor (Missile)
bf2d576d-90cc-4cda-a4c0-ce93dc261f37.text:
M3-A Interceptor only.

Your upgrade bar gains the , , or upgrade icon.

c35a65fa-ed3e-4bfc-abf9-34c4c6b9fd16.name: IG-2000
c35a65fa-ed3e-4bfc-abf9-34c4c6b9fd16.text:
Aggressor only.

You have the pilot ability of each other friendly ship with the IG-2000 Upgrade card (in addition to your own pilot ability).

b887cbbd-fc08-459e-8968-0d26b22588ed.name: BTL-A4 Y-Wing
b887cbbd-fc08-459e-8968-0d26b22588ed.text:
Y-Wing only.

You cannot attack ships outside your firing arc. After you perform a primary weapon attack, you may immediately perform an attack with a secondary weapon.

09ce360d-8a78-4348-9181-7cec65bda0eb.name: Andrasta
09ce360d-8a78-4348-9181-7cec65bda0eb.text: Your upgrade bar gains two additional upgrade icons.

327f701c-d870-489f-90d0-c6e7d34bfd69.name: TIE/x1
327f701c-d870-489f-90d0-c6e7d34bfd69.text:
TIE Advanced only.

Your upgrade bar gains the upgrade icon.

If you equip a upgrade, its squad point cost is reduced by 4 (to a minimum of 0).
